item.title: Deploying StatefulSets on Private AWS Fargate Cluster
item.description: Because Kubernetes has transformed the way organisations do application deployments and databases are integral part of the applications and can’t be left behind… In a previous article, we discussed the setup for Fully Private EKS on Fargate Cluster fulfilling security requirements of certain regulated industries.
